## ToastOptions interface

Display/configuration options for a toast notification.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ToastOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [assertiveness?](./blockly.toastoptions.assertiveness.md) |  | [Toast.Assertiveness](./blockly.toast.assertiveness.md) | _(Optional)_ How prominently/interrupting the readout of the toast should be for screenreaders. Corresponds to aria-live and defaults to polite. |
|  [duration?](./blockly.toastoptions.duration.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ Duration in seconds before the toast is removed. Defaults to 5. |
|  [id?](./blockly.toastoptions.id.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ Toast ID. If set along with <code>oncePerSession</code>, will cause subsequent toasts with this ID to not be shown. |
|  [message](./blockly.toastoptions.message.md) |  | string | Text of the message to display on the toast. |
|  [oncePerSession?](./blockly.toastoptions.oncepersession.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ Flag to show the toast once per session only. Subsequent calls are ignored. |
